Key Match Events: The Cubs rallied from an early deficit to tie the score but couldn’t quite pull off a series sweep.
Pre-Game Insights: A series victory against the Dodgers, one of only two playoff-bound teams left on the Cubs’ schedule entering the week, was undeniably a good result.
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Craig Counsell said, 'We played two excellent games on the bases and on defense. [On Wednesday], we played a really good game, but we made two mistakes on the bases. And that contributed to it just not being enough.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cubs' Cody Bellinger runs the bases after hitting a home run during the fifth inning against the Dodgers in Los Angeles.
Others: The Cubs sign veteran reliever Caleb Thielbar to one-year deal
Free agent Roki Sasaki has yet to 'narrow the field,' but the Cubs at least cleared the first step
The Cubs trade first baseman Matt Mervis to Marlins for utility player Vidal Brujan
